Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: I learn more with every job, and I'm very thankful for where I am

Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: We all make mistakes, and it's not until we make mistakes that we learn

Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my brothers' kids. It's funny - as an uncle, you become so protective of them

Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: For a few years, I went down a path where I forgot to be in the moment and enjoy the moment

Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: I read a lot of Zen books. And I grew up surfing, so that has always been my escape

Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have one addiction in life, it's probably food

Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: As the younger brother, I think you always have crushes on your older brother's girlfriends

Quote.Author: Liam Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Volleyball was the hardest thing I've ever had to do

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an ongoing joy being a dad

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, well, I finally stopped smoking for good

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: But, you know, sex is controversial, it just is and it always will be

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting married and settling down isn't the most important thing in my life

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to be a cowboy, and Jedi Knights are basically cowboys in space, right?

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the kind of actor that would know what my character had for breakfast last Tuesday

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's interesting, the more successful you become the more people want to give you stuff for nothing

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm constantly reading books on God or the absence of God and atheism

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood is throwing action movies at me

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if I'm a strict parent or a pushover

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to say I'm not ready for a fighter like Canelo Alvarez

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me the respect I deserve

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: My mum will never let me be anything but grounded

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If you ask anyone who my mum's blue-eyed boy is, they will say it is me

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If you put a camera on the wall, you would laugh at some of the fights me and my brothers had

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a humble guy, I'm pretty down to earth

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Before British title fights, I've played football on a Saturday before; it's silly as it is

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care who's in front of me; nobody is going to stop me from winning the world title

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not stupid. I know on paper I'm the B-side of this fight. Canelo's the big name

Quote.Author: Liam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Canelo isn't a full light-middleweight like I am, and that's to my advantage

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: If you fall in love with somebody you're working with, fine, but wait till your project is over

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: There's the private persona and the public persona and the two shall never meet

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: You should never ask actors about politics

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are going to remake a film, you may as well remake a classic

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that interested in working with impervious people

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm misrepresented as a scary person. I'm not. It's all about my size and my eyebrows

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I have a deep, deep affinity for Dr. Seuss

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: Where else do you find great directors? Acting is one of the places

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that everything I've ever done at some point is part of someone else's legacy

Quote.Author: Liev Schreiber
Quote.QuoteValue: Entitlement is lethal

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: I respect everybody, but at the same time, I carry myself with an aura that demands respect, too

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't had sex in eight months. To be honest, I now prefer to go bowling

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: Lil' Kim is my stage name and a character I use when I'm out working my livelihood

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a girly girl. I'm strong, but I'm very timid. Very dainty

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing things people don't expect

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are a real artist who is serious about your craft, you love good music. Period

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: I am definitely the queen. I definitely see myself as the queen

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people let me down... A lot of people I thought were my friends turned on me

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: I love spending time with my dog, my niece and my family. I'm very family-oriented

Quote.Author: Lil' Kim
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being the underdog sometimes

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: You need a really solid foundation of friends and family to keep you where you need to be

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: I know one of the reasons I first started making Youtube videos was because no one looks like me

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is the only thing worth fighting for in your life

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the type of person who doesn't hope, dream or wish for things. I work and work and work

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really important to talk to yourself and look at yourself in the mirror and love who you are

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no escalators - there's only staircases to success. There is no substitute for hard work

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: I always say that when I first started, my videos were very veered towards Indian people

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: I've discovered home is not a place anymore. It's the people around you

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: My inspiration comes from my real life experiences

Quote.Author: Lilly Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: The good thing about me is, I only do deals with people that I love to begin with

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: The first Disney movie I saw I think was 'Snow White.' I loved all the Disney princess movies

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: I love clothes but it's a struggle for me to get out of jeans and a baggy jumper

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: For exams, I swotted so hard because I couldn't bear the thought of not coming first

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to start the morning with a mist spray, especially after a night out

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: When people feel good, they look good

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: I really want to play interesting roles, but you want to work, so it's a balancing game

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: I naturally have a really small waist

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pretty disabling sometimes, the terror of not living up. My expectations are the worst

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: As cynical as I can be, there's always a part of me that believes in love and the fairy tale

Quote.Author: Lily James
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be Ursula in 'The Little Mermaid.'

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a teacher who gives you something to take home to think about besides homework

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Man invented language to satisfy his deep need to complain

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wondered why somebody doesn't do something about that. Then I realized I was somebody

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is the leading cause of stress among those in touch with it

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Creating characters is just another way to express a type and put that type to use

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote.QuoteValue: I personally think we developed language because of our deep need to complain

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - History is so subjective. The teller of it determines it

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - The musicals that leave us kind of staggering on our feet are the ones that really reach for a lot

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - If Hamilton were on Twitter, he would have been a worse oversharer than me

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - 'Rent' was the show that made me want to write. Or that showed me you're allowed to write

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - If there is a Busta Rhymes of musical theater, it probably is Mandy Patinkin

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - The only shows I saw as a kid were that holy trinity: 'Les Miz,' 'Cats,' 'Phantom.'

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - What 'Twilight Zone' did was show we all have a great capacity for good and evil

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - I kind of need to be ambulatory to write lyrics

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - Everything we know about Hamilton, we knew when he was alive, because he told us

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - I only know how to write musicals

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: It was God who made me so beautiful. If I weren't, then I'd be a teacher

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get out of bed for less than $10,000 a day

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: I can do anything you want me to do so long as I don't have to speak

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: We have this expression, Christy and I. We don't wake up for less than $10,000 a day

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't vogue, we are 'Vogue'

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a rock star was out of the question. I can't sing

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: When I started in the business, I was told I had three good years in me

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so glad this worked out for me, I do think I know how to be a good model

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: I never get out of bed for less than $10,000 a day

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: On days when I do not work, I am working on my image

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: Never say never. The things that you don't plan are the best. I'm a very spontaneous person

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love fashion. I think it just expresses who you are so much

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is full of risks anyway; why not take them?

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: My motto is: Live every day to the fullest - in moderation

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an angel compared to some of my friends

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my red hair. It makes me spunkier

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: It's my body. And I like my body. And I like my breasts. And no, they're not fake

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate it when people call me a teen queen

Quote.Author: Lindsay Lohan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a way of dealing with hardships that are healthier than going out. That's what I've learned

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: If 'Obama-care' becomes fully implemented in 2014, it's going to bankrupt states

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Iran is part of the problem, not the solution. And the Russian government is ignoring reality

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: The politics of judges is getting to be red hot

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: We're failing when it comes to controlling spending

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really American to avoid paying taxes, legally

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: The legal system in Afghanistan is very immature and porous

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, thank God for a media that will ask questions

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: It's one thing to shoot yourself in the foot. Just don't reload the gun

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: President Obama chose politics over leadership. 'Hope' and 'Change' have become bait-and-switch

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: It puts limits on criminals' rights to destroy unborn children without the permission of the woman

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very unfamiliar with YouTube; I thought it was the place for dog and cat videos

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I was creative and unique, and I've had that my whole life

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: I never would've tried YouTube if I hadn't had so many doors slammed in my face

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: YouTube did more for me than 'America's Got Talent.'

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time before I go into the studio, I say a prayer, and I really ask God for inspiration

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: All the things I do in my videos - the jumps, twirls and back bends - will also be onstage

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: I just loved EDM because I felt like it inspired dance and movement

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: YouTube is such a funny little world. You can create a fanbase

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I know a song really well, I can then have fun dancing

Quote.Author: Lindsey Stirling
Quote.QuoteValue: It was Skrillex who got me into dubstep. He made it melodic - not just a bunch of crazy sounds

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother-in-law's from Norway, and she's always liked old-school remedies

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought my face would be on the cover of a Red Bull Six Pack

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end, it's a mental maturity to let your best come out

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: When you fall, get right back up

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: I get up early, but it doesn't mean I like getting up early

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: You are only limited to what you push yourself to, you know? You can always get better

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety percent of the day is working out. Sometimes I get my nails done and go to the grocery store

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: Setbacks motivate me

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: Skiing takes so much out of me, and when I start a family, I want to do it 100%

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: If Microsoft ever does applications for Linux it means I've won

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: Microsoft isn't evil, they just make really crappy operating systems

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: Software is like sex: it's better when it's free

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: My name is Linus, and I am your God

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: Any program is only as good as it is useful

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: I do get my pizzas paid for by Linux indirectly

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm generally a very pragmatic person: that which works, works

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: In my opinion MS is a lot better at making money than it is at making good operating systems

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: Making Linux GPL'd was definitely the best thing I ever did

Quote.Author: Linus Torvalds
Quote.QuoteValue: Non-technical questions sometimes don't have an answer at all

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: There are more important things in life than winning or losing a game

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: What I do is play soccer, which is what I like

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: In football as in watchmaking, talent and elegance mean nothing without rigour and precision

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: Today I am the happiest man in the world, my son was born and thanks to God for this gift

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: The day you think there is no improvements to be made is a sad one for any player

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: When the year starts the objective is to win it all with the team, personal records are secondary

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: It's scoring goals that's great, whether against Brazil or anybody else

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to show up in the World Cup, and in the World Cup anything can happen

Quote.Author: Lionel Messi
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to accept you can't win all the time

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: People, as critical as it looks, we're OK. We are in control, whether we feel it or not

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Let the music play on' would be my legacy

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: Just when I think it couldn't get any bigger, 'Tuskegee' reaches a new level of success

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I find myself going out on the road to get my confidence back, because I lose it at home

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: All artists are egotistical maniacs with inferiority complexes

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: Greatness comes from fear. Fear can either shut us down and we go home, or we fight through it

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: People have allowed me into their homes, through my words and my music

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: My earliest memories of country music are the Grand Ole Opry

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I always like to challenge myself. I never want to be put into a box

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: Country music has always been about as close to R and B as you can possibly get. We're storytellers

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: There's so much grey to every story - nothing is so black and white

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: The best education I have ever received was through travel

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a culture where we're bombarded with so much noise and so much insecurity

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: I never run hills. My quads are already big enough. I don't run to build muscle; I do it for cardio

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm determined to raise a strong girl

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: We are such a product of our upbringing and environment

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: My hope is that I can somehow raise the level of consciousness about world events

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: I have not watched 'Honey Boo Boo'

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: Our time on Earth is so random

Quote.Author: Lisa Ling
Quote.QuoteValue: I fancy myself as being a fairly competent person

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody in the spotlight can get lost in that if they are not careful

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a tendency to kick it up. I like to rattle the cage

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll say it loud and say it proud. I'm completely insane

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: You are always learning; there is a lot of grey; don't take things for granted

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to pave my own path artistically

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've failed every test I've ever taken. If there was a failure I would have been it

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Being Elvis Presley's daughter is a whole lot of pressure. It's been a constant burden in my life

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just not interested in selling out to get on the charts and make people happy

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Music has always gotten me through life, particularly honest, real music

Quote.Author: Lisa Marie Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: If you lined up everyone I've ever dated, you wouldn't see any similarities

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom comes from strength and self-reliance

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: The war against terrorism is one we must win

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to face it, as a nation we have a reliance on petroleum

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I've supported the repeal of ObamaCare

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never once asked Alaskans to like how I got this job

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I am working for Alaska's best interests

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Our hunting areas are the grocery store

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: The Voting Rights Act of 1965 brought an end to the ugly Jim Crow period in American history

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: We fail to boost our offshore production at our own expense

Quote.Author: Lisa Murkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not believe and I do not believe that Planned Parenthood should be defunded

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think a woman has to act like a man to show that she has strength

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: But men are so full of greed today, they'll sell anything for a little piece of money

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: Some situations you cause yourself

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: Elvis may be the King of Rock and Roll, but I am the Queen

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: God is omnipotent, He is omniscient, and He is ever present

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: But I'm a rock 'n' roll singer; that's my livelihood, my occupation

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: Greed has taken the whole universe, and nobody is worried about their soul

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew I was a man, always felt that I was a man, always wanted to be a man

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: I did what I felt, and I felt what I did, at all costs

Quote.Author: Little Richard
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't give the devil credit for creating nothing

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: Rome has grown since its humble beginnings that it is now overwhelmed by its own greatness

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: From abundance springs satiety

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: In difficult and desperate cases, the boldest counsels are the safest

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are only clever at shifting blame from their own shoulders to those of others

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are slower to recognize blessings than misfortunes

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: There is always more spirit in attack than in defence

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: The sun has not yet set for all time

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better that a guilty man should not be brought to trial than that he should be acquitted

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: Toil and pleasure, dissimilar in nature, are nevertheless united by a certain natural bond

Quote.Author: Livy
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth, they say, is but too often in difficulties, but is never finally suppressed

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know; it just seemed like the cooler guys are playing Xbox. At least the ones I know

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm competitive, so I don't like to feel marginalized by the people who sell a lot of records

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm working on a proper rock record, a good, old-school rock record. Finally

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what the future holds. Anything is possible

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised to be a very intelligent housewife

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I love stretching myself musically

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't fit into the box

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I prance around and dance by myself to hip-hop songs in the mirror

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: Wearing a veneer of perfection never did me any good

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know why it surprises people that I surprise them

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything is possible in this world. I really believe that

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is something you rise above

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Audiences are the same all over the world, and if you entertain them, they'll respond

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, I inherited the disease of alcoholism, and I learned early to get help when I needed it

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: The regrets of yesterday and the fear of tomorrow can kill you

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to work hard for it, but first you have to want it, and then you have to dream on it

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fine, and my hips are fine. My false knee is fine. My false hips are fine. Everything's cooking

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: What good is sitting all alone in your room?

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Smoking is one of the leading causes of all statistics

Quote.Author: Liza Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: In Hollywood now when people die they don't say, 'Did he leave a will?' but 'Did he leave a diary?'

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm suited to harsh conditions, I don't like racing in the heat

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I find weddings too procedural sometimes. I just want a big, fun party

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't look at my emails on the weekend or after 6 o'clock in the day

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being world champion

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no big deal if I disappoint strangers

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I will never cheat in any walk of life

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: A world championship medal on the road is something that I'm missing from my CV

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm 100 per cent motivated. I haven't done enough yet in cycling to be satisfied

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I am sorry for causing anyone to lose faith in sport

Quote.Author: Lizzie Armitstead
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm quite un-traditional

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: God blesses us all with different views and perspectives and levels of influence and power

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: Our world is at the crossroads. We have a choice, right and wrong
